page.title: Krispy Kreme Posts Loss, Stock Off 16 Pct
page.text: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=KKD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">KKD.N</A> on Monday reported a quarterly loss due to store closings and sluggish sales, sending its stock down 16 percent.
